Corpus: JRC EU DGT Translation Memory Parsebank DGT-UD
Language: Bulgarian,  Croatian,  Czech,  Danish,  Dutch,  English,  Estonian,  Finnish,  French,  German,  Hungarian,  Irish,  Italian,  Latvian,  Lithuanian,  Modern Greek (1453-),  Polish,  Portuguese,  Romanian,  Slovak,  Slovenian,  Spanish,  Swedish
Description: This is a 23-language parallel syntactically parsed corpus, which consists of the JRC DGT translation memory of European law, automatically annotated with UD-Pipe 1.2 using Universal Dependencies 2.0 models.#SEPThe corpus is available for download from the CLARIN.SI repository and for online browsing through the KonText and noSketch Engine concordancers.

Language: Bulgarian, Czech, Danish, German, Greek, English, Spanish, Estonian, Finnish, French, Hungarian, Italian, Lithuanian, Latvian, Maltese, Dutch, Polish, Portuguese, Romanian, Slovak, Slovene and Swedish
Description: This is a parallel corpus of Acquis Communautaire, which is the total body of European Union law applicable in European member states.#SEPMost texts have been manually classified according to the EUROVOC subject domains so that the collection can also be used to train and test multi-label classification algorithms and keyword-assignment software. The corpus is encoded in XML, according to the Text Encoding Initiative Guidelines. Due to the large number of parallel texts in many languages, the JRC-Acquis is particularly suitable to carry out all types of cross-language research, as well as to test and benchmark text analysis software across different languages (for instance for alignment, sentence splitting and term extraction). The sentence-level alignment was done using the hunalign tool.#SEPThe corpus is available for download from the CLARIN:EL repository.
This is a parallel corpus of the European Union Law pertaining to COVID-19 period.#SEPThe corpus is available for download from the PORTULAN repository.

Corpus: Legal texts from Estonian Ministry of Justice (Processed)
Description: This corpus contains Estonian-English translations of the Acts of Estonian law.#SEPThe corpus is available for download from PORTULAN.

Language: Finnish, Slovak, Lithuanian, Croatian, Slovenian, Estonian, Latvian, Maltese, English, German, French, Italian, Spanish; Castilian, Polish, Romanian; Moldavian; Moldovan, Dutch; Flemish, Modern Greek (1453-), Hungarian, Portuguese, Czech, Swedish, Bulgarian, Danish
Description: This corpus consists of 65,000 European laws in 23 official European languages. Each law has been annotated with the EuroVoc concept labels.#SEPThe corpus is available for download from the repository of CLARIN:EL.

Language: Maltese, Hungarian, Lithuanian, Latvian, Polish, Portuguese, English, Slovenian, Modern Greek, Spanish (Castilian), Romanian, Slovak, Moldavian, Swedish, Bulgarian, Italian, German, Croatian, French, Dutch (Flemish), Czech, Finnish, Danish, Irish, Estonian
Description: This is a multilingual corpus of the European Union Law pertaining to COVID-19 period.#SEPThe corpus is available for download from the PORTULAN repository.
